pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.13.1_0: ‘If a monk himself transfers a robe to a monk, to a nun, to a trainee nun, to a novice monk, or to a novice nun, and he then uses it without it first being relinquished, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.2_0: At that time Venerable Upananda the Sakyan had transferred a robe to a monk who was his brother’s student. He then used that robe without that monk having relinquished it.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.4_0: “Venerable Upananada is using a robe that he has transferred to me, even though I haven’t relinquished it.”
